definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...

sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中医和印度草药医学里的药用历史悠久。

sentences.english: Studies of blue honeysuckle(Lonicera caerulea L. ) were briefly reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 简述了蓝靛果忍冬种质资源的研究进展。

sentences.english: The small size fruit phenomenon was unrelated to the contradiction of nutrients supply and demand.
sentences.chinese: 小果现象与树体营养供需矛盾无关。

sentences.english: It is a cornucopia of riches, symbolized by the overflowing market basket.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个财富的丰饶角，被满溢出的果菜篮体现。

sentences.english: Strong wind blew off the pineapple guavas .
Moreover, fruit mean weight of blotchy ripening fruit was significantly higher than normal fruit.
sentences.chinese: 而且筋腐果的平均单果重显著地高于正常果。

sentences.english: I filled my plate with turkey and potatoes and cranberry jello.
sentences.chinese: 我会盛些火鸡，土豆和吉勒红莓果。

sentences.english: It works on my 9-month old baby who suffers from eczema.
sentences.chinese: 我9个月年夜的宝宝得了湿疹，它对他有用果的。

sentences.english: True to my prediction, in the afternoon I ran to the park. There was nothing left but the tender twigs.
sentences.chinese: 果不出所料，下午再跑到公园，只剩嫩枝了。

sentences.english: Will you take my son's mandrakes too?
sentences.chinese: 难道现在你还要把我儿子的多情果也抢去吗？

sentences.english: The order of variation coefficient of phenotypic were leaf, body size, flower and fruit.
sentences.chinese: 各性状变异系数的大小次序为叶＞树体＞花＞果。

sentences.english: Capsule dehiscing loculicidally or septicidally , rarely fruit fleshy and indehiscent.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果纵向开裂或者室间开裂，很少为肉质和不裂的果。

sentences.english: Control group was fed with basal ration.
sentences.chinese: 的果寡糖，以基础日粮组作为对照组。

sentences.english: And that trust in cause, condition and effect is so called the devotion Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 相信因，缘，果，就是被称作虔诚于佛教。

sentences.english: The mature fruit of mango are assumes a yellow oblong aspect.
sentences.chinese: 果成熟果实呈黄色长卵形是典型的核果。
